title: Behavior of derivatives from graph of function

content.prompt:
The graph of y = f ( x ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3EB0@ is shown in the figure above. On which of the following intervals are d y d x > 0 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3EF8@ and d 2 y d x 2 < 0 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4119@ ?

I.a<x<b

II.b<x<c

III.c<x<d

topic.text: 5.3: Determining Intervals on Which a Function Is Increasing or Decreasing

skill.text: Skill 2.D: Identify how mathematical characteristics or properties of functions are related in different representations.
